summary:
Social media are online tools that let people connect, share, and chat with others. They help build communities and share ideas, memories, and news. People use them on computers or phones. Examples include Facebook, Twitter, and Instagram.

While social media can be good for connecting, it also has downsides. It can expose kids to bad content, cause sleep and attention issues, and even hurt mental health. Some people also worry it divides people and hurts democracy.
title: Social media
